_xResult.title: Classic Luxurious Rib Turtleneck
_xResult.longdesc:
The "LUXE TURTLENECK" is a luxurious, super-comfortable, multi-season top made with sustainable bamboo fabric. A fine detailed rib turtleneck, this top will make you feel sophisticated.

Bamboo is naturally anti-microbial, hypoallergenic and thermal regulating. Bamboo breathes and wicks moisture away due to its porous nature. Bamboo is also one of nature’s most sustainable resources; it’s 100% biodegradable, naturally regenerative and does not require the use of any pesticides or chemicals to grow.

Look beautiful and feel beautiful in this classic, timeless design that shows the world you are fashion-forward and mindful of the environment. Made with love and care.

  • The perfect essential for everyday wear

  • Slim fitting design that hugs your body

  • Comfortable neck, long sleeves and body

  • 4 way stretch bamboo fabric

  • Breathable, durable

Fabric: Sustainable Bamboo Rib - Classic woven, heavyweight fabric (not see-through). 

Content: 65% Bamboo Rayon, 28% Cotton, 5% Elastic

Care: Machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry. Do not bleach. Steam iron with protective cloth.

Colors (in order from left to right on last photo): Black, White.

Model wears color Black.

properties.propvalue: Machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry, do not bleach, steam iron with protective cloth
